show.description: Whether it is displayed or not

description.description: For the description above the options, see the example above
description.description_zh: 选项上方的描述信息，见上方文档示例

actions.description: The text array of the button is shown in the document above for an example
actions.description_zh: 按钮的文字数组，见上方文档示例

cancelText.description: The text of the cancel button is displayed when the button is not empty
cancelText.description_zh: 取消按钮的文字，不为空时显示按钮

closeOnClickAction.description: Whether to close the pop-up window when clicking on a menu item is shown in the document example above
closeOnClickAction.description_zh: 点击某个菜单项时是否关闭弹窗，见上方文档示例

safeAreaInsetBottom.description: Whether to enable [Bottom Safe Area Adaptation] (/components/safeAreaInset.html#Description of the safe-area-set parameter of some components of uview)
safeAreaInsetBottom.description_zh: 是否开启[底部安全区适配](/components/safeAreaInset.html#关于uview某些组件safe-area-inset参数的说明)

events.name: select
events.description: Triggered when an ActionSheet list item is clicked

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the cancel button is clicked

events.name: getuserinfo
events.description: When the user clicks this button, the obtained user information will be returned, and the detail data of the callback is the same as that returned by wx.getUserInfo, which is valid when openType="getUserInfo".
events.description_zh: 用户点击该按钮时，会返回获取到的用户信息，回调的 detail 数据与 wx.getUserInfo 返回的一致，openType="getUserInfo"时有效

events.name: contact
events.description: The callback of the customer service message is valid when openType="contact".

events.name: getphonenumber
events.description: The callback to get the user's mobile phone number is valid when openType="getPhoneNumber".
events.description_zh: 获取用户手机号回调，openType="getPhoneNumber"时有效

events.name: error
events.description: When using open capability, an error callback occurs, which is valid when openType="error" is used
events.description_zh: 当使用开放能力时，发生错误的回调，openType="error"时有效

events.name: launchapp
events.description: The callback of the successful opening of the APP, openType="launchApp", is valid
events.description_zh: 打开 APP 成功的回调，openType="launchApp"时有效

events.name: opensetting
events.description: After opening the authorization settings page, the callback is valid when openType="openSetting".
events.description_zh: 在打开授权设置页后回调，openType="openSetting"时有效
